Classes/MulticastDelegate.html#/s:vC17Mu.name: allDelegates
Classes/MulticastDelegate.html#/s:vC17Mu.abstract: An array of T representing all currently added delegates.

Classes/MulticastDelegate.html#/s:vC17Mu.name: isEmpty
Classes/MulticastDelegate.html#/s:vC17Mu.abstract: true if there are no delegates contained in the delegate table.

Classes/MulticastDelegate.html#/s:FC17Mu.name: add(_:)
Classes/MulticastDelegate.html#/s:FC17Mu.abstract: Adds a delegate T to the delegate table.

Classes/MulticastDelegate.html#/s:FC17Mu.name: remove(_:)
Classes/MulticastDelegate.html#/s:FC17Mu.abstract: Removes a delegate T from the delegate table.

Classes/MulticastDelegate.html#/s:FC17Mu.name: removeAll()
Classes/MulticastDelegate.html#/s:FC17Mu.abstract: Removes all delegates from the delegate table.

Classes/MulticastDelegate.html#/s:FC17Mu.name: invoke(_:)
Classes/MulticastDelegate.html#/s:FC17Mu.abstract: Invokes the closure on each delegate in the delegate table.

Classes/MulticastDelegate.html.name: MulticastDelegate
Classes/MulticastDelegate.html.abstract: MulticastDelegate - A linked list of delegates, also called an invocation list.
